```{r}

func1 <- function( data ) {
  return ( summary(data) ) #summarises the data and returns
}

```

```{r}

#Load the Library Tidyverse
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
data(Orange) 

Orange %>% func1() %>% 
  print()
```

Here you go boss, these are some summary statistics about Oranges.

```{r}
func2 <- function(data) {
  return( colnames(data) ) #returns colom names
}
```

```{r}
Orange %>% func2() %>% 
  print()
```

Here you go again boss, the second function.
